name: Scooby Horror
description:
Scooby Doo is missing. No one knows for sure where he is, but they've got a clue.  He's been kidnapped by a group of ghosts in glowing diving suits, hiding in the woods near a lake. They've probably got Scooby Doo. Who the hell knows what they've been doing to Scooby.

Gameplay: This is a short horror game where you play as Shaggy, looking for Scooby Doo (he's trapped in a cage btw), in the woods at night, cause why not. You must find Scooby and get out before they catch you. Scooby Doo is always in a random place each time you play, so if you find him in a building, next time you play, he'll probably be in the mines.

Inspired by: Slendy Tubbies and I guess Slender as well.

Notes: I wanted to make the enemy the Diver from the Scooby Doo episode: A Clue For Scooby Doo (1969) and wanted to make the game spooky too I suppose. I always wanted to play a 3D Scooby Doo horror game where the enemy wasn't some dude in a monster costume but an actual ghost. I hate the new Scooby Doo shows, they're all shit. I only go back and watch the old 60s Scooby Doo sometimes cause I found it more entertaining, it gave me Scooby Doo horror game ideas and brings back fond memories of years ago when I'd watch Scooby Doo on Boomerang, in the morning.

Anyway, I hope you enjoy this game and have as much fun playing it as I did making it.

Got any ideas for updates? Let me know, and I'll gladly add it if I'm able to. Also contact me if you make a gameplay vid about my game. I'd love to know.

Created by: Dave Microwaves Games
